body: {"id":"001","title":"Grilled Chicken Salad","day":"2022-01-01","description":"A healthy and delicious grilled chicken salad.","link":"","sections":[{"title":"Ingredients","type":"ingredients","items":["2 chicken breasts","Mixed salad greens","Cherry tomatoes","Cucumber","Olive oil"]},{"title":"Instructions","type":"steps","items":["Season chicken breasts","Grill until cooked through","Slice chicken","Combine with vegetables","Drizzle with olive oil"]},{"title":"Nutrition","type":"nutrition","items":[]}]}
